reviews.review:
Great Game Just have 2 issues 
1st the Cool down time it really sucks when Competative Section Says it takes 6 days to cooldown 
2nd is that so many people hack the game as well since the game is free to play people create new account and stat using esp and hack third party applications
Best game ever. Recommend this for everyone :D

CS:GO is a fun, competitive, addictive game there are a lot of things to do, a lot of achievements to earn and a lot of game modes to play, it is fun, but u will meet a lot of toxic players.
if you are cool with playing against cheaters , than this is the best game the god has ever created !
Jogo bastante competitivo mas engraçado de jogar com amigos +rep
